players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie was found dead. Investigate Diana as she seems suspicious."
Diana: "Investigation confirmed. I'm the mafioso, target Bob next."
Bob: "Thanks for the info, Alice. Diana confessed she's mafia & will target me. Be cautious."
Diana: "Will watch Bob, stay safe."
Bob: "Beware, Diana is mafia & targets me. Alice, keep an eye on her."
You: "Beware of Diana, she's mafia and targeting Bob. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie was found dead. Investigate Diana as she seems suspicious."
Diana: "Investigation confirmed. I'm the mafioso, target Bob next."
You: "Thanks for the info, Alice. Diana confessed she's mafia & will target me. Be cautious."
Diana: "Will watch Bob, stay safe."
You: "Beware, Diana is mafia & targets me. Alice, keep an eye on her."
Alice: "Beware of Diana, she's mafia and targeting Bob. Stay vigilant."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
